riskfactor.txt: Being female is the most important risk factor for breast cancer
type.label: Demographic

riskfactor.txt: Many studies show drinking alcohol increases the risk of breast cancer
type.label: Behavioural

riskfactor.txt: Women who have a BRCA1 gene mutation have an increased risk of breast cancer
type.label: Genetic

riskfactor.txt: Women who have a BRCA2 gene mutation have an increased risk of breast cancer
type.label: Genetic

riskfactor.txt: Mutation of ATM can increase Breast cancer risk factor.
type.label: Genetic

riskfactor.txt: Mutation of TP53 can increase Breast cancer risk factor
type.label: Genetic

riskfactor.txt: Current or recent use of birth control pills (oral contraceptives) slightly increases the risk of breast cancer
type.label: Behavioural

riskfactor: Menopausal hormone therapy - estrogen plus progestin
riskfactor.txt: In the past, many women used menopausal hormone therapy (MHT) to relieve hot flashes and other symptoms of menopause. MHT is also known as postmenopausal hormone therapy and hormone replacement therapy. Estrogen plus progestin increases the risk of breast cancer and breast cancer death.
type.label: Clinical

riskfactor.txt: Smoking increases the risk of many cancers, but its effect on breast cancer is still under study.
type.label: Behavioural
